detail_desc: Iron-on fabric patch to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 12 cm.

Sleeveless playsuit in a gently draping weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening with concealed buttons at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, an elasticated seam and a soft, detachable belt with D-rings at the waist, and short slits in the hems.
Calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a seam under the bust. V-neck front and back with lacing and a concealed zip at the back, and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined at the top.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with buttons down the back, a seam at the waist with a detachable bow at the back and a skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.
Jacquard-knit jumper in soft cotton with a ribbed shawl collar with a button, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slightly shorter, skinny legs.
Metal earrings. Length 9.5 cm.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Glittery metal hairclips. Length 5 cm.
Soft, non-wired lace up bra with lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and front fastening.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a small frilled collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked bodice. Short, elasticated puff sleeves, and a frill trim at the hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with press-studs and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Bikini with an all-over print. Top with narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top. Lined at the front. Bottoms with a frill at the sides and lined gusset.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, one back pocket, decorative stitching on the legs and ribbed hems.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with detachable ties, gathers in the sides for best fit and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with an asymmetric seam at the hem, diagonal flounce at the front and concealed zip at the back. Bonded jersey lining.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Metal rings in various designs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and raw-edge sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with a collar and long sleeves with picot trims. Press-studs at the back and crotch.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a grandad collar, fake welt pocket at the top, partially concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Dress in a soft weave with embroidery and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a seam, a seam at the hem and a wide, gathered flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Long dress in patterned viscose jersey with smocking at the top and narrow shoulder straps.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Detachable fabric belt with metal rings at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in soft, light silk with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with flared cuffs with a tie.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a chest pocket, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless top in an airy weave with a V-neck, spaghetti straps and embroidery at the top.
Hooded sports top in airy, fast-drying jersey with raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a drawstring at the hem.
Ribbed jersey top with a round neckline decorated with plastic stones and long sleeves.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidered text detail at the top, low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with pleats. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim. High waist with a V-shaped seam, zip fly and button and front and back pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Bikini top in fast-drying functional fabric in a narrow cut at the top. Lined at the front with removable inserts. Mesh racer back with a chunky zip at the back, an asymmetric seam under the bust and wide elastication at the hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket. Gently rounded hem at the back.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, press-studs at the crotch and frill-trimmed hems.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Skirt in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and appliqués. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a draped knot detail at the hem.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist and zip fly with a button. Slim legs that finish just above the knees with removable tack stitches at the hems.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a slightly worn look with a zip at the front, fake pockets with decorative zips and a belt with press-stud fasteners at the sides. Unlined.
Striped top in textured jersey with a low neckline, wide sleeves with elastication at the top and cuffs, decorative buttons down the front and a flounce at the hem.
Treggings in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a decorative button and front and back pockets.
Fitted, turtleneck top in mesh with long sleeves.
Long shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in imitation leather. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases at the front and raw-edge hems.
Satin-covered Alice band with ears and a veil.
Tunic in woven fabric with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, detachable tie belt at the waist and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a seam centre front and a twisted detail at the hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Thin, jacquard-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length trousers in a woven viscose blend. High waist with pleats at the front and covered elastication at the back, and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Knee socks in a soft knit with elastication at the top. One pair in a textured knit and one pair in a smooth knit.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Fabric-covered, USB 2.0 charging cable suitable for iPhones 5/5c/5s and iPhone 6/6s. Length 1 m. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
V-neck top in sequined mesh with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Set with a bodysuit and shorts in soft, organic cotton. Short-sleeved jersey bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
